title: What Agentic Workflows Mean to Microservices Developers
author: Janakiram MSV
description: Agentic workflows are not a replacement for microservices; they serve as a new coordination layer built upon existing service invocation.
cntitle: Agentic Workflow 对微服务开发者意味着什么
cndescription: Agentic workflow 并非微服务的替代品，而是建立在现有服务调用之上的新型协调层。
